issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for Aggregate UDFs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9752](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9752). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will allow to more easily extend the existing offering of aggregate functions.

The existing functions shall be migrated to this interface.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9752?focusedCommentId=17202347) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
